arc_stage: Stage 1 â€“ Desperation & doubt: feels rejected, frustrated, and believes she will never be good enough. No internship yet.
transcript:
March 22nd, 2023

I am attempting to record my thoughts in a manner that is coherent and easy to comprehend. I have been experiencing a high level of anxiety regarding the internship at Weaver, Erickson and Johnson. Despite receiving multiple rejection letters, I was finally offered an opportunity to participate in their design program as an intern. During my interview, I was bombarded by an overwhelming array of lights and sounds that made it challenging for me to focus. The fluorescent hum of the conference room's overhead lighting created a sense of disorientation, and I found myself struggling to maintain eye contact with Mario Long, our potential employer.

segments.text:
March 22nd, 2023

I am attempting to record my thoughts in a manner that is coherent and easy to comprehend.

I have been experiencing a high level of anxiety regarding the internship at Weaver, Erickson and Johnson. Despite receiving multiple rejection letters, I was finally offered an opportunity to participate in their design program as an intern.
During my interview, I was bombarded by an overwhelming array of lights and sounds that made it challenging for me to focus.
The fluorescent hum of the conference room's overhead lighting created a sense of disorientation, and I found myself struggling to maintain eye contact with Mario Long, our potential employer.

summary: The author, despite receiving multiple rejection letters, was recently offered an internship at Weaver, Erickson and Johnson after a challenging interview experience where they were overwhelmed by the environment, including loud lights and fluorescent hum. This anxiety has left them uncertain about accepting the opportunity.
